structure.unit: Inspection And Sale Of Food, Drugs And Various Articles

law.catch_line: Construction Of Malt Beverage Or Soft Drink Metal Containers
law.text: No person shall distribute, sell, or offer for sale any malt beverage or carbonated soft drink for consumption within the commonwealth in a metal can so constructed that in order to open the can a part may be moved which, by design, is not intended to remain attached to the open can. Whoever violates the provisions of this section shall be punished by a fine of not more than one hundred dollars.
